channel.title: Fatal error on the server, then crash
channel.description:
I get
[code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20624) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19024) at client.packetSending(client.java:18977) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
And I also get:
[code]Connection accepted from 69.2.207.7: 58187.[/code]
Anyone know what it means?

item.title: Fatal error on the server, then crash
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Here you go `Rich.

[code]
} else if (NPCID == 7) { // THEIVING hero
if (playerLevel[17] < 70) {
sendMessage(“You need 70 theiving to pickpocket farmers.”);
} else {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
robhero();
actionTimer = 4;
setAnimation(881);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
} else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {
println_debug("atNPC 2: " + NPCID);
}
if (FishingGo == true) {
IsUsingSkill = true;
PutNPCCoords = true;
fishing[0] = 1;
}
if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
}
break;

    case 72: // Click to attack
        if (attacknpc > 0) {
            sendMessage("You are already attacking an npc!");
        } else {
            attacknpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
            boolean Cant = false;

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].attacknpc > 0) {
                Cant = true;
                sendMessage("You can't attack a dueling npc!");
            }
            boolean slayer = true;

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 5) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 5 to attack chickens.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 90) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 20) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 20 to attack skeletons.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1648) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 30) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 30 to attack crawling hands.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1832) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack cave bugs.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 50) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 50 to attack jellys.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1604) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 65) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 65 to attack aberrant specters.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 50) {
                if (playerLevel[2] >= 75) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a strength level of 75 to attack King Black Dragon's.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 113) {
                if (playerLevel[0] >= 55) {
                    slayer = true;
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a attack level of 55 to attack Jogre's.");
                }[/code]

I did add a shop not too long ago but it didn’t workout.

item.title: Fatal error on the server, then crash
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:4, topic:243184”][quote author=kihomura link=topic=319505.msg2531611#msg2531611 date=1226494231]
The second part means a connection was accepted.

(Someone has logged into the server)
[/quote]
Yes, a null is on everytime that shows…

`Rich, how do I open my class file…? I think you mean a .java file[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2008, 08:23:02 pm[/size][hr]Someone told me my No-IP is flooded…[/quote]

They’re a retard.

Show me lines 20600 - 20700
